TopicTitle: What's the inverted nose cone trick?

Articles.Content: Could you be more specific; this might be better placed in the Gameplay Questions section.

6 hours ago, Lunar Sea said:

Explain this to me.

If I interpret this right, you are talking about how some nosecones and nosecone-like intakes have less drag when rotated upside down after placement. Used to make an upside down shock cone intake the lowest drag nosepiece. That used to be a thing, yes, but I don't know if the bug was fixed in 1.1.

 

Rune. I sure hope so, frankly.
Thanks, I figured it was something like that. And yeah Gameplay is probably the more appropriate forum but I thought more experienced builders would see it here
